name: The Southampton Model Railway Exhibition
transport: Free heritage bus service between college and Eastleigh/Southampton Airport Parkway stations approximately every half hour from 9:30am
description: Barton Peveril College is about 1 1/2 miles from M3 Junc 13 or M27 Junc 5 and will be AA signed from shortly after the junctions. Eastleigh and Southampton Airport Parkway stations are both about 25 mins walk.

name: Irvine Model Railway Exhibition
venue: The Linthouse Building, Scottish Maritime Museum
description: After a very successful Exhibition in the Scottish Maritime Museum in 2022 it has been agreed that there will be an Exhibition in 2023.

name: Model Railway Exhibition
description: Annual exhibition celebrating 60 years since the founding of Kendal Model Railway Club

name: Longfield Model Railway Exhibition 2023
description: The Erith Model Railway Society's January Exhibition, one of South East England's largest shows (And probably Kent's largest by stand numbers), will return to the Longfield Academy for our 6th show there (And our first since 2020). The show will continue to encompass at least 30 layouts, extensive trade and society support, demonstrators, static exhibits and charity raffle, making nearly 90 stands in total.

name: Pontefract Model Railway Exhibition
organizer: Normanton and Pontefract Model Railway Society
description: The Pontefract Model Railway Exhibition will return to NEW College for 2023, with the Society hosting its 52nd show. Selection of quality layouts and trade support. Cafe serving a range of refreshments.

name: Basingstoke & North Hants Model Railway Society Exhibition
organizer: Basingstoke & North Hants Model Railway Society
